headline: Here to Help; You Asked: Is Incontinence Inevitable?
abstract: A reader asks if her urinary leaking is a simple fact of aging. (Hint: It doesnâ€™t have to be.)
lead_paragraph: Dr. Gunter, I am a postmenopausal 63-year-old woman. I am wondering if the fate of all women my age and older is to wear pads for leakage. I understand your specialty is gynecology and not urology but thought you could weigh in on any advances in this area as the two specialties are related.
